title: PepuScan - Pepe Unchained Block Explorer
content: PepuScan is the official block explorer for Pepe Unchained. You can use PepuScan (pepuscan.com) to view transactions, blocks, addresses, smart contracts, and all on-chain activity on the Pepe Unchained network. It works similar to Etherscan but for the Pepe Unchained Layer 2 blockchain. You can search for transaction hashes, wallet addresses, contract addresses, and block numbers to see detailed information about network activity.

title: Pepe Unchained Key Information
content: Pepe Unchained is an EVM-compatible Layer 2 blockchain built on Ethereum. Key features: Very low gas fees compared to Ethereum mainnet, fast transaction speeds, supports all Ethereum tools and wallets like MetaMask. PEPU is the native token. The network has a DEX for trading, bridge functionality to move assets between Ethereum and Pepe Unchained, staking capabilities for PEPU tokens, and PepuScan block explorer for viewing on-chain data.

title: Pump Pad - Launch Your Meme Coin
content: Pump Pad is a platform on Pepe Unchained that allows users to launch their own meme coins. It is part of the Pepe Unchained ecosystem and integrates with the Layer 2 blockchain infrastructure. Pump Pad enables creators to launch meme coins on the Pepe Unchained network, taking advantage of the low gas fees and fast transaction speeds. It is featured on the main Pepe Unchained website as one of the key products in the ecosystem.

title: What is Pepe Unchained? | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: Ethereum's Dominance vs. the Meme Economy Ethereum's dominance in the blockchain ecosystem is undeniable, but it's not without challenges. High gas fees during network congestion make it costly for users to interact with smart contracts and dApps. Meanwhile, alternative chains like Solana, despite offering low fees, face issues like network outages and congestion during peak activity.Enter Pepe Unchaineda dedicated Layer 2 solution built for the meme economy, offering a unique mix of scalability, speed, and utility tailored to the needs of meme creators, collectors, and enthusiasts.The Problem: No Real Meme Chain Exists Meme culture is a driving force in the crypto world, yet there's no blockchain optimized for its unique needs. Platforms either lack scalability, suffer from high fees, or dont cater to the specific requirements of a meme-driven economy.Pepe Unchained changes this by dedicating itself entirely to the meme ecosystem. Its focus is not just on memes for entertainment but also on enabling real utility, such as decentralized applications (dApps), NFT marketplaces, and community-driven governanceall designed to thrive in a meme-first environment.The Solution: A Purpose-Built Meme Ecosystem Pepe Unchained is a next-generation Layer 2 blockchain dedicated to empowering the meme economy. Designed to overcome the limitations of traditional chains, Pepe Unchained delivers a platform that combines speed, scalability, and affordability with a laser focus on fostering meme-driven innovation.What Makes Pepe Unchained the Powerhouse It Is?Low Gas Fees, High Throughput: Built as a Layer 2 on Ethereum, Pepe Unchained significantly reduces transaction costs while maintaining the security and decentralization of the Ethereum mainnet. Whether you're minting NFTs or trading tokens, it ensures seamless, cost-effective interactions.Speed Matters: Meme trends move at lightning speed. To keep up, transactions need to settle almost instantly.

title: What is Pepe Unchained? | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: ensures seamless, cost-effective interactions.Speed Matters: Meme trends move at lightning speed. To keep up, transactions need to settle almost instantly.  Pepe Unchained provides fast finality, ensuring your creations, trades, and interactions are processed without delay.Dedicated to Meme Culture: Unlike generic blockchains, Pepe Unchained is purpose-built for memes and their unique ecosystem. From NFT staking to meme-driven DAOs, it offers tools and infrastructure that prioritize creative and community-driven projects.Sustainability and Scalability: With Ethereum's roll-up-centric roadmap, Layer 2 solutions like Pepe Unchained benefit from a future-proofed infrastructure that can scale alongside the broader Ethereum ecosystem. As demand grows, so does its capacity to support the meme economy.Cross-Chain Interoperability: Pepe Unchained isnt an isolated solution. Through bridges and partnerships, it enables seamless interoperability with Ethereum and other major chains, ensuring memes reach the widest audience possible.Real Utility Meets Memes: Beyond humor and hype, Pepe Unchained is designed for real-world applications. From community-driven voting systems to decentralized meme vaults, the possibilities extend far beyond the memes themselves.Developer-Friendly SDK: Its comprehensive Software Development Kit (SDK) is purpose-built for ease of use, allowing developers to seamlessly build and deploy dApps, NFTs, and innovative projects tailored to the Pepe Unchained ecosystem.Pepe Frens with Benefits: Pepe Unchained prioritizes the longevity of the chain and its ecosystem. Early developers and contributors are supported through grants, incentives, and resources to create unique, groundbreaking applications that add lasting value.Why Now? The blockchain space is ripe for a dedicated meme chain. The cultural and financial impact of meme tokens has been proven time and again, but the infrastructure hasnt caught upuntil now.

title: What is Pepe Unchained? | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: cultural and financial impact of meme tokens has been proven time and again, but the infrastructure hasnt caught upuntil now.  Pepe Unchained fills this gap, providing a home for meme creators, traders, and communities to thrive in a scalable and sustainable ecosystem.

title: Ecosystem Overview | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: Ecosystem OverviewWelcome to the Pepe Unchained EcosystemThe Pepe Unchained Ecosystem is designed to provide users and developers with a seamless, secure, and scalable blockchain experience. Whether you're deploying decentralized applications, trading assets, or bridging tokens between chains, Pepe Unchained offers all the tools and resources you need.Our ecosystem is built to foster innovation and usability, with a focus on developer-friendly solutions, secure infrastructure, and accessible tools for everyone.Key Ecosystem LinksBelow are the essential links to navigate the Pepe Unchained ecosystem:Main Website: https:pepeunchained.com Explore everything Pepe Unchained has to offer, including news, updates, and resources.Block Explorer: https:pepuscan.com Track transactions, explore blocks, and monitor the state of the Pepe Unchained blockchain.Bridge: https:pepubridge.com Effortlessly bridge your assets between Ethereum and Pepe Unchained.Decentralized Exchange (DEX): https:pepuswap.com Trade your favorite tokens natively on the Pepe Unchained chain.DEX Analytics: https:analytics.pepuswap.comContract AddressesThe following table lists the key contract addresses for tokens on Ethereum and Pepe Unchained:TokenChainContract AddressPEPUEthereum0x93aA0ccD1e5628d3A841C4DbdF602D9eb04085d6PEPE Unchained0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000USDCEthereum0xA0b86991c6218b36c1d19D4a2e9Eb0cE3606eB48PEPE Unchained0x20fB684Bfc1aBAaD3AceC5712f2Aa30bd494dF74USDTEthereum0xdAC17F958D2ee523a2206206994597C13D831ec7PEPE Unchained0x06f69A40C33C5A4Cd038BBE1DA689D4D636Ec448WETHEthereum0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2PEPE Unchained0x7CCC51754216C04D4Bb1210630cCA16e5430Aa70WPEPUPEPE Unchained0xF9Cf4A16d26979b929Be7176bAc4e7084975FCB8As the Pepe Unchained ecosystem grows, this page will serve as the central hub for all relevant links, resources, and updates. Stay tuned as we continue to expand the possibilities for users and developers alike!RPC: https:rpc-pepu-v2-mainnet-0.t.

content: relevant links, resources, and updates. Stay tuned as we continue to expand the possibilities for users and developers alike!RPC: https:rpc-pepu-v2-mainnet-0.t. conduit.xyzPreviousWhat is Pepe Unchained?

title: Block Explorer | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: If the Pepe Unchained Block Explorer looks familiar-- that's because it was designed that way. The Pepe Unchained block explorer is an integral tool in the Pepe Unchained ecosystem. It provides users with precision insights into all blockchain activities--in a form and format that most blockchain enthusiasts are well familiar with, and that newcomers will quickly grasp. The block explorer is designed for transparency and reliability first, with easy of navigation as its main goal. The Pepe Unchained block explorer allows users to explore and verify transactions, blocks, and contracts--giving greater accessibility to all blockchain data within the ecosystem. Key Features and Functionalities:1. Transaction LookupSearch Capability: Users can input transaction IDs (TxIDs), wallet addresses, or block numbers to find details about a transaction or activity.Details Provided:Sender and recipient addressesAmount of tokens transferredGas fees incurredTimestamp of the transactionStatus (successful, pending, or failed)2. Block DataBlock Insights: Provides information on recently mined blocks:Block heightNumber of transactions in the blockMining time and miner addressTotal gas fees collectedHash of the blockReal-Time Updates: New blocks are added to the explorer in real-time, keeping users informed about the latest network activity.3. Wallet AnalyticsAddress Activity: Enables users to view the transaction history of a specific wallet address, including sent and received transactions.Token Balances: Displays balances of various tokens associated with the wallet, including Pepe-specific meme tokens.Portfolio Tracking: Allows users to monitor holdings and their transaction trends over time.4. Token TrackingCustom Tokens: Users can view and verify the creation, distribution, and trading of tokens on the ecosystem.Supply Details: Displays token metadata such as total supply, circulating supply, and holders.5.

title: Block Explorer | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: distribution, and trading of tokens on the ecosystem.Supply Details: Displays token metadata such as total supply, circulating supply, and holders.5.  Smart Contract InteractionVerification and Auditing: Users can view and verify the source code of deployed smart contracts, ensuring that contracts are secure and meet community standards.Execution Tracking: Tracks the interactions and calls made to smart contracts, providing insights into decentralized applications built on Pepe Chain.6. Network StatisticsReal-Time Metrics: Includes data on:Total transactions on the networkNetwork throughput (TPS  Transactions Per Second)Total value locked (TVL) in DeFi protocols on Pepe ChainCurrent and historical gas fee averagesNetwork Health: Provides insights into overall network performance, including uptime and node activity.7. User-Friendly InterfaceSearch Filters: Intuitive filters for searching transactions by date, amount, address, or type.Mobile-Friendly Design: Optimized for both desktop and mobile devices to ensure accessibility for all users.8. Developer ToolsAPI Access: Provides developers with APIs to integrate block data into their applications or analytics tools.Webhook Integration: Enables real-time notifications for specific transactions or blockchain events.SDK Support: Developer kits for building advanced applications that interact with the Pepe Unchained Layer 2.9. Security and TransparencyImmutable Records: Ensures that all recorded data is tamper-proof, reflecting the true state of the blockchain.Open Data: Makes blockchain activity publicly available for inspection and analysis, fostering trust in the ecosystem.10. Community FeaturesReporting Tools: Users can report suspicious activities or contracts for further review by the community or ecosystem administrators.Educational Resources: Includes tutorials on how to use the block explorer and interpret blockchain data, making it accessible to beginners.

title: Block Explorer | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: administrators.Educational Resources: Includes tutorials on how to use the block explorer and interpret blockchain data, making it accessible to beginners. Use CasesIndividual Users: Verify their transactions, monitor wallet balances, or check gas fees before making transfers.Developers: Debug smart contracts, analyze network trends, and build applications using block explorer APIs.Traders: Track token performance, trade history, and other on-chain metrics to make informed decisions.Auditors: Conduct transparent audits of Pepe Chain activities for compliance and security purposes.The Pepe Unchained Block Explorer bridges the gap between complex blockchain technology and its users by offering a simple yet powerful tool for exploring the Layer 2 ecosystem.

title: Bridging funds | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: Seamless bridgin between chainsThe Pepe Unchained Bridge is the link to seamless transfers between Ethereum Layer 1, and Pepe Unchained Layer 2 ecosystem. The bridge serves as the pathway to interoperability, allowing users to move assets between networks, and back again if needed.Deposit to Pepe Unchained Layer 2: Tokens sent from Ethereum Layer 1 are locked in a smart contract, and equivalent tokens are minted on Pepe Unchained.Withdraw to Ethereum Layer 1: When youre ready, tokens on Layer 2 are burned, and your original tokens are released back to you on Ethereum.Why Use the Bridge?Save Money on Fees: Ethereums gas fees can get expensive, especially during peak times. Pepe Unchained Layer 2 has significantly lower transaction costs. The Pepe Unchained bridge allows users to take full advantage of that seamlessly. Speed: Transactions on Layer 2 are processed much faster than on Ethereum Layer 1, making Pepe Unchained ideal for fast and frequent transactions.Flexibility: Move assets back and forth based on your needs.Features Youll AppreciateSimple Interface: The bridge is designed in a recognizable, familiar format designed to be as user-friendly as possible. No gimmicks, just simple, fast bridging between layers. No need to be a blockchain expert to utilize this bridge.Wide Token Support: You can bridge popular tokens like ETH, USDT, and Pepe Unchained ecosystem tokens.Real-Time Updates: Keep track of your transaction progress with notifications and utilize the block explorer for verification and data analysis.Secure and ReliableThe Pepe Unchained Bridge is built with security as a top priority:Decentralized Operations: The bridge is non-custodial, meaning you stay in full control of your tokens. Validators confirm each transfer to ensure everything runs smoothly.More than just a transfer toolits the link that connects Ethereums ecosystem with the speed and efficiency of Pepe Unchained Layer 2.

title: DEX | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: Looks, feels, and acts like Uniswap--a familiar platform.Our DEX is customized for the Pepe Unchained Layer 2 environment and is a very easy-to-use facsimile of Uniswap. By leveraging the speed, security, and low fees of Pepe Unchained L2, our DEX provides a seamless trading experience for meme coins and other tokens in the ecosystem.Key FeaturesLayer 2 Native: Built directly on the Pepe Unchained L2, delivering ultra-fast transaction speeds, minimal gas costs, and a frictionless user experience.Uniswap Familiarity: If youve used Uniswap before, this'll feel like home. The core functionsswapping, providing liquidity, and creating poolsare all familiar and user-friendly.Future-Ready Infrastructure: Integration with the broader Pepe Unchained ecosystemlike Pepes Pump Pad and our custom bridgeensures effortless navigation between platforms and opportunities.Getting StartedContract AddressesIn order to trade or interact with PEPU token on various blockchains, and within various liquidity pools, you will need the contract addresses listed in the table below:PrerequisitesPepe Unchained-Compatible Wallet: Youll need a wallet that supports the Pepe Unchained Layer 2, such as MetaMask or another L2-compatible wallet.Native Tokens: Ensure you hold the Pepe Unchained native token for gas fees and trading pairs.Connecting Your WalletSelect a Supported Wallet: Install and configure a supported wallet that can connect to Pepe Unchained (e.g., MetaMask with a custom network configuration).Network Setup: Add the Pepe Unchained L2 RPC details to your wallet. Refer to our SDK Guide for RPC endpoints.Fund Your Wallet: Transfer assets to Pepe Unchained L2 using our Bridge. Ensure you have enough L2-native tokens to cover transaction fees.Swapping TokensOpen the DEX UI: Navigate to the Pepe Unchained DEX interface in your browser.Select Tokens: Choose the token you want to swap from and the token you wish to receive.Enter Trade Amount: Specify the amount you want to swap.

title: DEX | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: want to swap from and the token you wish to receive.Enter Trade Amount: Specify the amount you want to swap.  The interface will automatically calculate the estimated return and fees.Confirm and Sign: Click Swap, and then confirm the transaction in your wallet. Your swap will process quickly, thanks to L2s low latency and low fees.Providing LiquidityNavigate to the Pool Section: Go to the Pool tab on the DEX interface.Select a Pair: Pick the token pair you want to provide liquidity for, or create a new pair if it doesnt exist yet.Add Liquidity: Input the amount of each token you want to contribute. The DEX will display the pool share youll receive.Supply and Confirm: Click Supply, then confirm the transaction in your wallet. Youll receive LP (Liquidity Provider) tokens as proof of your share in the pool.Removing LiquidityAccess Your Pool Positions: In the Pool tab, youll see all your liquidity positions.Select the LP Tokens: Choose the amount of LP tokens you want to redeem.Withdraw and Confirm: Click Remove Liquidity, specify the proportion of tokens youd like back, and confirm the transaction in your wallet.Advanced TopicsImpermanent LossJust like Uniswap, providing liquidity on Pepe Unchained DEX comes with the concept of impermanent loss. Before staking significant amounts, consider reading about Impermanent Loss to understand potential risks.Smart Contract AddressesFactory and Router Contracts: For developers and advanced users, our smart contract addresses and ABIs are available to integrate directly with the DEXs underlying contracts.Advanced AnalyticsKeep track of pool performance, volume, token prices, and more through our integrated Analytics Dashboard. This will help you make informed decisions about which pools to join or tokens to trade.Troubleshooting  SupportCommon Issues: Check our FAQ for quick answers about transaction errors, wallet connectivity problems, or RPC issues.

title: DEX | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: to trade.Troubleshooting  SupportCommon Issues: Check our FAQ for quick answers about transaction errors, wallet connectivity problems, or RPC issues. Community Support: Join our Telegram channel to get real-time help, share insights, and stay updated.Bug Reports  Feature Requests: If you encounter a bug or have ideas for improvements, please submit a GitHub Issue or reach out to the dev team.By combining the familiar functionalities of Uniswap with the speed and low costs of Pepe Unchained Layer 2, our DEX is an essential tool in the Pepe Unchained ecosystem.

title: How to Use & Buy $PEPU (Step-by-Step for Beginners) | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: PEPU is the native token for Pepe Unchained, a Layer-2 network. Youll need PEPU to use dApps, send tokens, and do anything our network. PEPU can either be purchased on decentralized or centralized exchanges. Step 1: Get a Compatible WalletYou will need one of the following wallets if you want to interact with the Pepu ecosystem. Make sure to save your recovery phrase somewhere safe and never share it - it gives full access to your wallet!MetaMask (Recommended)Coinbase Wallet (Only if using recovery phrase setup)Trust Wallet (Android app or browser extension only)Step 2: Add PEPU to Your WalletYou have two ways to get PEPU: 1. Using a DEX (Decentralized Exchange) like Uniswap 2. Using a CEX (Centralized Exchange) listed belowOption 1: Buy PEPU on a DEX (Uniswap)PEPU contract address : Copy0x93aA0ccD1e5628d3A841C4DbdF602D9eb04085d6What You Need First:A wallet (from Step 1)Some ETH (Ethereum) in your wallet to swap  pay gas fees Steps:Open your wallet and make sure its funded with ETHGo to UniswapConnect your walletChoose ETH as the token you're paying withSelect PEPU as the token you're buying (You may need to paste the token address if it doesnt show up automatically)Enter the amount of ETH you want to swap for PEPULeave a little ETH for gas fees!Confirm the swap and wait for it to completeOption 2: Buy PEPU on a CEXWhat You Need First:A wallet (from Step 1)A CEX account (like MEXC, LBank, etc.

title: How to Use & Buy $PEPU (Step-by-Step for Beginners) | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: completeOption 2: Buy PEPU on a CEXWhat You Need First:A wallet (from Step 1)A CEX account (like MEXC, LBank, etc. )USDT in your CEX accountSome ETH in your wallet to pay for gas when withdrawingSteps:Sign up on a CEX that lists PEPUFund your account with USDTFind the PEPUUSDT trading pair and buy PEPUWithdraw your PEPU to your wallet addressDouble-check you're withdrawing to the correct network (Ethereum)Each CEX is different, so follow their instructions carefullyMake sure your wallet has a small amount of ETH to pay for any transaction feesAlways double-check token addresses to avoid scamsDont use up all your ETH  you need some to pay for transactionsIf something seems confusing, take your time or ask for help from the communityPEPU can be traded on the platforms listed below Exchange LinkUNISWAP(DEX)ETHPEPUMEXCPEPUUSDTBingXPEPUUSDTBitMartPEPUUSDTLBankPEPUUSDTXT.

title: How to Bridge to Pepu L2 | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: Before bridging - Wallet CheckMake sure that your wallet can support custom networks like Pepe Unchained Layer 2 BEFORE you bridge.If your wallet does not support custom networks then DO NOT bridge to Pepe Unchained Layer 2. If you do bridge without custom networks support in your wallet you will not be able to make any transactions on Pepe Unchained Layer 2 or bridge back to Ethereum.Wallets with Custom Network SupportMetamaskCoinbase Wallet (Recovery phrase wallets only)Trust Wallet (only Android, or browser extension)Rainbow Wallet (Browser extension only)How to bridgeVideo credit SafeyieldCryptoStrategist, Please Note: Due to changes on super bridge, instead of clicking "Review Bridge" a bridge route will appear after entering desired bridge amount. Go to pepubridge.com Connect your wallet Input the PEPU amount you want to bridge Ensure you have enough Eth for gas All possible routes will then pop up, select "Native Bridge" or any other route of your choice (If available) Follow the prompts  add network Wait 10 mins Get your PEPU on Pepe Unchained V2You can also add the Pepu network to your wallet by clicking "Add Pepe Unchained V2" at the bottom of the bridge page and following the promptsPepe Unchained Layer 2 Network InformationNetwork name: Pepe Unchained V2RPC:https:rpc-pepu-v2-mainnet-0.t.conduit.xyzChain ID: 97741Currency Symbol: PEPUBlock Explorer:https:explorer-pepu-v2-mainnet-0.t.conduit.xyzFor more information on bridging or supported wallets please review this article https:help.superbridge.

title: How to Stake $PEPU | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: How Staking Rewards WorkStaking rewards are distributed per block, currently at a rate of 6.34 PEPU.Your rewards are calculated based on your share of the total staking pool. The more PEPU you stake, the higher your  of the pool. New stakes are subject to a 7 day lock. Per block: 6.34 PEPU total is distributedYour portion: Based on your  of the poolRewards are dynamic and will adjust over timeMonthly Estimate: (Annual   12)Daily Estimate: (Annual   365)This model ensures sustainability and fairness as the network grows. How to StakeIt only takes a few steps to start earning:Visit https:pepeunchained.

title: Frens With Benefits Program | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: https:apply.pepeunchained.comformIn the world of crypto, you're nothing without a little help from your frens. That's why the team at Pepe Unchained has introduced a really cool developer grant program that allows novice and professional developers alike to get involved and start building on the Pepe Unchained Layer 2 ecosystem.Real Grants For Real IdeasPart of what makes Pepe Unchained so powerful is that we're not just a meme coin. We've built out an entire ecosystem, that, along with the help of builders, and our community, will thrive. In order to ensure the Pepe Unchained Layer 2 thrives, and becomes one of the elite projects in the decentralized world, we need elite builders!The Pepe Frens With Benefits Developer Grant Program will incentivize blockchain builders to build their next big idea on Pepe Unchained L2, diversifying the ecosystem, bringing wide-scale adoption--while devs are rewarded for their brilliance and hard work.How To ApplyThe application process is very simple. Simply go to https:apply.pepeunchained.comform And fill out the application form. This only takes a few minutes.We ask that you give as much detail about your project as possible, along with rough budget estimates, while factoring in your own work as a developer. Once submitted, you'll receive an email confirmation that we've received your submission.The Pepe Unchained Council will then review all of the submissions, on an ongoing basis, and contact successful applicants to receive their grants and start building!This is a major step towards widescale adoption of the Pepe Unchained L2, and we're thrilled to bring along some of the brightest minds in the crypto space.

title: Software Development Kit | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: Software Development Kit (SDK)Empowering Developers on Pepe UnchainedThe success of any blockchain ecosystem relies on the tools and support it provides to its developers. At Pepe Unchained, we understand that a robust Software Development Kit (SDK) combined with strong financial and informational support is the cornerstone of fostering innovation and building a thriving ecosystem.To ensure our developers have access to industry-leading tools, we have partnered with Thirdweb, a trusted and widely used platform. Thirdweb equips developers with the ability to:Seamlessly Develop and Deploy Smart Contracts: Simplify the process of creating, testing, and deploying custom smart contracts tailored to various use cases.Build Innovative Games: Leverage a suite of tools to develop on-chain and hybrid blockchain games with ease.Create Custom Tools: Develop dApps and utilities to expand the functionality of the Pepe Unchained ecosystem.Why Thirdweb?Thirdwebs reputation as a leading development platform stems from its focus on user-friendly interfaces, comprehensive documentation, and support for a variety of blockchains. By integrating Thirdweb with Pepe Unchained, developers gain access to:Code-Free Deployment: Launch smart contracts without needing advanced coding expertise.Cross-Chain Support: Build interoperable applications and deploy them seamlessly across multiple chains.Developer-Friendly Documentation: Clear, concise, and thorough documentation ensures that both beginners and advanced developers can make the most of the tools provided.Live Support and Community Resources: Access real-time assistance and connect with a vibrant community of developers and contributors.Getting StartedReady to begin your journey on Pepe Unchained? Start building today by visiting Thirdweb's Pepe Unchained SDK. Whether you're crafting the next viral blockchain game or deploying innovative DeFi protocols, Pepe Unchained and Thirdweb provide all the tools you need to succeed.

title: Software Development Kit | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: viral blockchain game or deploying innovative DeFi protocols, Pepe Unchained and Thirdweb provide all the tools you need to succeed. Our Commitment to DevelopersIn addition to Thirdweb, Pepe Unchained offers financial and informational support to developers who are committed to building on our chain. This includes:Grants and Incentives: Funding to help promising projects scale and achieve their vision.Workshops and Training: Regular sessions to help developers master the SDK and stay updated on the latest trends.Community-Built Libraries: Open-source tools and libraries contributed by the Pepe Unchained developer community to simplify common tasks.By prioritizing developer support and integrating powerful tools like Thirdweb, Pepe Unchained is setting the stage for a vibrant ecosystem that fosters creativity, innovation, and growth.

title: Ecosystem Overview | Pepe Unchained Docs
content: Ecosystem OverviewWelcome to the Pepe Unchained EcosystemThe Pepe Unchained Ecosystem is designed to provide users and developers with a seamless, secure, and scalable blockchain experience. Whether you're deploying decentralized applications, trading assets, or bridging tokens between chains, Pepe Unchained offers all the tools and resources you need.Our ecosystem is built to foster innovation and usability, with a focus on developer-friendly solutions, secure infrastructure, and accessible tools for everyone.Key Ecosystem LinksBelow are the essential links to navigate the Pepe Unchained ecosystem:Main Website: https:pepeunchained.com Explore everything Pepe Unchained has to offer, including news, updates, and resources.Block Explorer: https:pepuscan.com Track transactions, explore blocks, and monitor the state of the Pepe Unchained blockchain.Bridge: https:pepubridge.com Effortlessly bridge your assets between Ethereum and Pepe Unchained.Decentralized Exchange (DEX): https:pepuswap.com Trade your favorite tokens natively on the Pepe Unchained chain.DEX Analytics: https:analytics.pepuswap.comContract AddressesThe following table lists the key contract addresses for tokens on Ethereum and Pepe Unchained:TokenChainContract AddressPEPUEthereum0x93aA0ccD1e5628d3A841C4DbdF602D9eb04085d6PEPE Unchained0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000USDCEthereum0xA0b86991c6218b36c1d19D4a2e9Eb0cE3606eB48PEPE Unchained0x20fB684Bfc1aBAaD3AceC5712f2Aa30bd494dF74USDTEthereum0xdAC17F958D2ee523a2206206994597C13D831ec7PEPE Unchained0x06f69A40C33C5A4Cd038BBE1DA689D4D636Ec448WETHEthereum0xC02aaA39b223FE8D0A0e5C4F27eAD9083C756Cc2PEPE Unchained0x7CCC51754216C04D4Bb1210630cCA16e5430Aa70WPEPUPEPE Unchained0xF9Cf4A16d26979b929Be7176bAc4e7084975FCB8As the Pepe Unchained ecosystem grows, this page will serve as the central hub for all relevant links, resources, and updates. Stay tuned as we continue to expand the possibilities for users and developers alike!RPC: https:rpc-pepu-v2-mainnet-0.t.
